alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 2:32AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Hamilton and northern Fulton Counties through 330 AM EDT... At 232 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Big Moose to near Dolgeville. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Indian Lake, Speculator, Lake Pleasant, Wells, Stratford, Blue Mountain Lake, Lake Eaton Campground, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Lake Durant Campground, Eighth Lake Campground, Lewey Lake Campground, Golden Beach Campground, Moffitt Beach Campground, Forked Lake Public Campground, Sacandaga Campground, Raquette Lake, Long Lake, Hope, Arietta and Benson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
